channel.title: Cisco router
channel.description:
I got a new router (Cisco DDR2200-CL ADSL) yesterday and have been trying to portforward it since. I checked almost every major website for portforwarding including portforward.com and none of them seem to have any information on it. I followed the installation guide for my router from my ISP and set up port triggering/forwarding the way it said to do so. I even added exceptions to my firewall. No matter what I do it just isn't working. If you can help, I would really appreciate it.
Also, not sure if this matters, but I'm on the Windows 8 dev. preview. If you can help, I would appreciate it. :)

item.title: Cisco router
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

Hehe no problem

Read full topic

item.title: Cisco router
item.dc:creator: @xEvo Exion
item.description:
@xEvo wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:15, topic:415475”][quote author=Exion link=topic=517424.msg3758491#msg3758491 date=1316665949]

Make sure you have the ports open in the Windows firewall.

I did open them in the firewall. I’m starting to think Windows 8 is just being gay so I’m going to install 7 again.

Oh… windows 8 beta came out right?
Or the real thing?

Just the Windows 8 dev. preview.
http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/apps/br229516
[/quote]
OO
Never knew that

Back on topic i guess :o[/quote]
So it was a problem with Windows 8. Ports open now. Thanks for everyones help.

Read full topic

item.title: Cisco router
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Exion, post:9, topic:415475”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=517424.msg3758422#msg3758422 date=1316662399]

If all else fails… you can try the all go free portforwarding by ry(numbers), or utorrent, well the all go free portforwarding if your going for RSPS, i just assumed you were :o

Guess I’ll try the all go free one, I was looking for it earlier but couldn’t find it. I tried uTorrent and my friend still isn’t able to connect to me and we both get weird errors.

Yeah, its not stickied anymore, BUT, its still there, saw it the other day, got curious and went looking for it.

Which section is it in? Searched for it but can’t find it.

Think the tuts section

1 sec…
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,442058.msg3246665.html#msg3246665

Thanks, trying now.

No problem, but make sure you can access your router settings because i think you have to modify some stuff within there too to get it to work correctly.
[/quote]
Yep, I can.

Edit: I tried to do uTorrent again, and it said my ports are open with it. I still get no response though.

Edit2: Gonna try to switch back to Windows 7 to see if it works on that.[/quote]
Hmm sucks to hear for some reason it doesn’t work with some router or just sometimes…

Read full topic

Edit2: Gonna try to switch back to Windows 7 to see if it works on that.

Read full topic
